title: MacBook Pro Retina Early 2013 820-3332-A Powers on bot won't load any OS
message:
MacBook Pro Retina Early 2013 820-3332-A Powers on bot won't load any OS

Even with external SSD it tries to load but shutsdown right after, holing the Alt key at the start brings up the drive boot menu but as soon as you select any HD including ASD one it shuts down, sometimes when it does load the OS it gets really really hot.

title: MacBook Pro Retina Early 2013 820-3332-A Powers on bot won't load any OS
message:
Reflow/resolder U8900.
Change it, if still the same.
After that, only remains GPU as culprit.
See if pass all ASD EFI tests.

title: MacBook Pro Retina Early 2013 820-3332-A Powers on bot won't load any OS
message: Thanks will try, right now it is not even giving me the boot option or should anything on screen after power on.

title: MacBook Pro Retina Early 2013 820-3332-A Powers on bot won't load any OS
MacBook Pro Retina Early 2013 820-3332-A Powers on bot won't load any OS
message: Resoldering U8900 fixed it, muchos thanks!
